summary: Quick stand-up where the PM asked what to work on today; Architect, Developer, and QA introduced themselves and stated availability for blocker review, help, and testing respectively. Team agreed on notification flows for testing readiness and offered an on-demand architectural sync for blockers.

actions.task: Clarify today's priorities and assign specific sprint tasks to the team
Monitor sprint tasks, surface any blockers, and ping the Architect if architectural review is needed
Be ready to test items; expect the team to send "Ready for testing!" along with the expected output when items are ready
Join a quick sync on short notice if blockers requiring architectural input are reported

risks.risk: Unreported or late-reported blockers could delay sprint progress.
risks.mitigation: Team to proactively report blockers in stand-ups or directly to the PM; PM to coordinate quick syncs with the Architect when needed; developers to escalate early.
